column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ nna ɔbarimba kwasampanyi bi wɔ hɔ a ne dzin dze Seba
column3: a ɔyɛ Benjaminnyi Bikri ne ba: na ɔhɛɛn abɛn see dɛ
column4: Yennyi kyɛpɛn wɔ David mu
column5: nkyii so yennyi egyapadze wɔ Jesse ne ba no mu: Israel e
column6: nyimpa biara nkɔ n’asesee mu oo."

column2: "Nna Israel mbarimba no nyinara fii David n’ekyir na wɔkɔree kedzii Seba
column3: Bikri ne ba no n’ekyir: na Juda mbarimba no dze wɔtakyeer hɔn hen ho
column4: fi Jordan do araa baa Jerusalɛm."

column2: "Na David baa ne fie wɔ Jerusalɛm; na ɔhen no faa no nwewefo mbaa du no a ogyaa hɔn dɛ wɔnhwɛ fie no
column3: na ɔdze hɔn koguu beebi fofor
column4: na ɔbɔɔ hɔn akɔhoma
column5: na hɔn nkyɛn dze ɔannkɔ. Nna wɔtoow hɔn mu araa ma okodur hɔn wu da

column2: "Nna ɔhen no see Amasa dɛ
column3: Kɛfrɛfrɛ Juda mbarimba no ma me ma wonhyia wɔ ndaansa ntamu
column4: na ɔwoara so bra begyina ha."

column2: "Nna Amasa sii mu kɔr dɛ orikehyiahyia Juda mbarimba no ma woeehyia: na ɔkyɛree ma ɔseen aber a wɔdze hyɛɛ no no."
"Na David see Abishai dɛ
column3: Afei na Seba
column4: Bikri ne ba no
column5: bɛyɛ hɛn bɔn asen dza Absalom yɛe no: ɔwoara fa wo wura no nkowaa no
column7: ɔno bɛyɛ na oenya nkurow a wɔagye ho ban mu afa
column8: na oefi nsa eguan efi hɛn enyi do."

column2: "Na Joab ne mbarimba no
column3: na Keretfo
column4: na Peletfo
column5: na mbarimba akatakyi no nyinara tui dzii n’ekyir: na wotui fii Jerusalɛm dɛ woritsiw Bikri ne ba Seba."

column2: "Aber a wodur ɔbo kɛse no a ɔwɔ Gibeon no ho no
column3: Amasa bae behyiaa hɔn. Nna Joab ɔabɔ n’akontar a ɔhyɛ no do
column4: na ɔno do nna wɔdze abɔdo afona a ɔhyɛ no bɔha mu wɔ do akyekyer n’asen; na orifir edzi no ɔworɔwee tɔɔ famu."

column2: "Na Joab see Amasa dɛ
column3: Mo nua
column4: ana wo ho ye? Na Joab dze ne nsa enyimfa suoo Amasa n’abɔdwesa mu dɛ ɔrefew n’ano."

column2: "Na Amasa dze ɔannhwɛ afona no a ɔdze Joab ne nsamu no: dɛm ntsi ɔdze wɔɔ ne yafun mu
column3: na otuu no nson guu famu
column4: na ɔammfee no do; na owui. Na Joab na no nua Abishai tsiiw Bikri ne ba Seba."

column2: "Na Joab ne mberantsɛ no mu baako gyinaa ne nkyɛn
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Nyia ɔpɛ Joab n’asɛm

column2: "Na Amasa yankayankaam no bɔgyaa mu wɔ tsempɔn no mu. Na ɔbarimba no hun dɛ nkorɔfo no nyinara gyinaa hɔ dzinn no
column3: ɔsoaa Amasa fii tsempɔn no mu kɔtoo haban mu
column4: na ohun dɛ obiara a obodu ne nkyɛn no ogyina dzinn ntsi

column2: "Aber a woyii no fii tsempɔn no do no
column3: nkorɔfo no nyinara kɔree kedzii Joab n’ekyir
column4: dɛ woritsiw Bikri ne ba Seba."

column2: "Na ɔdze faa Israel ebusuakuw ebusuakuw nyinara mu twaa mu kɔr Aber
column3: na Bɛt-maaka
column4: na Berifo nyina mu: na wɔboaboaa ano

column2: "Na wɔbae botuaa no wɔ Abel a ɔwɔ Bɛt-maaka
column3: na wɔtotoow kurow no ho pampi
column4: na ogyinaa akoban no ne tsentsendo: na nkorɔfo a wɔka Joab ho nyinara pempeem fasu no

column2: "Nna ɔbaa nyansafo bi fii kurow no mu tseaa mu dɛ
column3: Wontsie oo
column4: wontsie oo; meserɛ hom
column6: Twe pin ha ma menye wo nkasa."

column2: "Na ɔtwee piin ne nkyɛn; na ɔbaa no see dɛ
column3: Ana ɔwo nye Joab a? Na obuaa dɛ
column4: Mara a. Nna ɔsee no dɛ
column5: Tsie w’afonabaa ne nsɛm. Na obuaa dɛ

column2: "Nna ɔkaa dɛ
column3: Tsetseber no wɔtɔ dɛ wɔka no dɛ
column4: bisa na wombisa apam wɔ Abel: na dɛm no nna woetwa asɛm no do."

column2: "Modɔm Israel mu hɔn a wɔpɛ asomdwee na nokwar: ɔwo rohwehwɛ asɛɛ Israel mu kurow tsitsir: ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na erebɛmen EWURADZE n’egyapadze yi?"
"Na Joab buae see dɛ
column3: Ɔmpar me
column4: ɔmpar me dɛ mebɛmen anaa mebɛsɛɛ."

column2: "Asɛm no nntse dɛm: mbom ɔbarimba bi a ofi Efraim nkokodo nkurow mu a ne dzin dze Seba
column3: Bikri ne ba no
column4: na ɔama ne nsa do etsia ɔhen
column5: mekyerɛ David a: hom nyi no nkotoo mma
column6: na mibefi kurow no ho makɔ. Na ɔbaa no see Joab dɛ
column8: wɔbɔtow ne tsir akyen fasu no ekyir."

column2: "Nna ɔbaa no dze ne nyansaa mu kɔr ɔman no nyinara nkyɛn. Na wotwaa Bikri ne ba Seba ne tsir
column3: na wɔtowee kyeen Joab. Na ɔhɛɛn abɛn
column4: na wofii kurow no ho petsee
column5: nyimpa biara kɔr n’asesee mu. Na Joab sanee baa ɔhen nkyɛn wɔ Jerusalɛm."

column2: "Afei Joab nna odzi Israel dɔm nyinara do: na Jehoiada ne ba Benaia
column3: na ɔhwɛ Keretfo na Peletfo do:"

column2: "na Adoram na ɔhwɛ edwumayɛ tow no do: na Ahilud ne ba Jehosafat na ɔyɛ ɔsɛnkaafo:"
"na Seva nye ɔkyerɛwfo: na Zadok nye Abiathar nye asɔfo:"
"nna Ira
column3: Jairnyi no so yɛ David no sɔfoe."
